hero.title: MINT AN NFT, HELP SAVE UKRAINE

about_us.title: WHO WE ARE
about_us.text1: We are citizens of Ukraine, which is currently under attack by russian soldiers. Our team consists of 3 people and we're trying to raise as much money for the ukrainian army, as humanly possible. Our people are dying and we cannot do everything alone.
about_us.text2: 100% of the profits are immediately sent to the army's bank account.

mint.title: MINT
mint.text: You can help the ukrainian army by minting any of the NFT's below. Any help is very appreciated but make sure you're not donating everything you've got.

results.title: RESULTS
results.text1: We will be posting daily updates on our official twitter account to keep everyone updated. Repeating the previous statement, 100% of the profits from the NFT minting is immediately transferred to the army.
results.text2: You can see the results for yourself by either checking out our Twitter or by looking at the transactions from our wallet on the solana explorer.
